column1: Funeral Service will be 10:30 a.m. Tuesday
column3: 2015 at the First Reformed Church in Ireton
column4: Iowa with Rev. Doug Van Aartsen officiating. Burial will follow in the Pleasant Hill Cemetery. Visitation will begin at noon Monday
